Title: Gunner
Writer: Gerry Conway (based on the Marvel comics by), John Romita Sr. (based on the Marvel comics by), Ross Andru (based on the Marvel comics by), Steve Lightfoot (created by), Michael Jones-Morales, Angela LaManna (story editor), Ken Kristensen (staff writer)
Actors: Jon Bernthal, Ebon Moss-Bachrach, Ben Barnes, Amber Rose Revah
Plot: Frank and Micro go looking for answers from a reluctant witness. Madani and Sam learn of a looming investigation. Rawlins sees a ghost.
